attributes.additional_details: Wandsworth Council will consider the installation of a Zebra crossing if enough people sign our petition. Please add your support and share with others that may want to help us take action.
attributes.background:
Our office is opposite Belleville School on Webb's road.
Every day during term time there are hundreds of children, parents and carers crossing the road outside our office and several near misses with traffic. It is a matter of time before something terrible happens. Lets take action now.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://www.wandsworth.gov.uk/info/200315/have_your_say/910/petitions_to_the_council
